name: VoiceRewardsMeFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Voice Rewards Me is how you earn using your Amazon Alexa device by answering surveys and sharing your opinions. Use the Voice Rewards Me Flash Briefing to get a quick update at available surveys.

Register for Voice Rewards Me at https://voicerewards.me and install the new full Voice Rewards Me skill today
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
